episodes.title: 10 Cult Leaders Who Faced Justice
episodes.description:
These cult leaders paid the price for their heinous crimes. For this list, we’ll be looking at some of the most famous cult leaders who actually faced some kind of repercussions. Our countdown includes Rajneesh & Ma Anand Sheela, Paul Schäfer, Charles Manson, and more! What do you think of these stories? Let us know in the comments below!

subjects: Church of the First Born of the Lamb of God

episodes.title: 10 Killer Cults You Should Know About
episodes.description:
When people think of killer cults, these are the ones that come to mind. For this list, we’ll be looking at some of the most dangerous religious sects in history. Our countdown includes The Vampire Clan, The Manson Family, The Fall River Cult, and more! Have you heard of all of these cults? Let us know in the comments.
